description:
Satsuki is Hajiki`s younger sister. A dancer, Satsuki is convinced she will someday become a professional, if she gets a new leotard so she doesn`t look shabby in front of the other girls. Both Hajiki and her mother give her money for this, because it`s the one thing she likes to do, and they support her in that, even if they`re poor.
Satsuki is always worried about her brother and knows he`s out getting himself in trouble, and has no problem shouting at him for being out too late and worrying their poor Mom. Katana takes her hostage to get to Hajiki.
Source: wiki
name: Sanada Satsuki
